oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Thomas Maupin chats with Dr. Robert Cogswell
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Champion buckdancer Thomas Maupin of Murfreesboro, TN, chats with Dr. Robert Cogswell, director of the TAC Folklife Program, at the opening reception for the Tradition: Tennessee Lives and Legacies at the Hunter Museum in Chattanooga, 2010.

All photographs for the book and exhibit were taken by Nashville photographer Dean Dixon under a contract with the TAC. Editorial copy provided by Dr. Robert Cogswell, director of the TAC Folklife Program.
